ai-tha-ap41:1.1_0: “There is no need for the Fortunate One,
ai-tha-ap41:1.2_0: Eaching in the presence of this lion,
ai-tha-ap41:2.3_0: they shake me out with a retinue,
ai-tha-ap41:4.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap41:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap41:4.4_0: this teaching is fruitful for the Dhamma,
ai-tha-ap41:5.1_0: One day, after going to the charnel ground,
ai-tha-ap41:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Protector of the Teaching.
